price: Dhugumatti isaan kafaran of tuulummaafi mormii keessa jiru.
arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي عِزَّةٖ وَشِقَاقٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: bali alladhīna kafarū fī ʿizzatin washiqāqin
